xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/710147-Claus Peymann Buys Himself a Pair of Trousers and Dines with Me 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Three short plays, reflecting the megalomania and the insecurity, the arrogance and the pusillanimousness, the moralic standards and the real feeling of powerlesness, not only of Peymann but all theater directors, put on stage in a brilliantly satirical way. Produced by the Akademietheater Vienna. Claus Peymann Buys Himself a Pair of Trousers and Dines with Me
